name: Vintage Kantha Quilt Reef Blue
description:
Made from vintage Indian Saris with 'Tropicana', light weight, hand blocked prints, cotton quilts are handcrafted in outer regions of Jaipur, India embroidered with the traditional Kantha running stitch.

There are two sizes

Double $120

Queen $140

(make sure you select the right size before checking out, default is set to Double) 

Suitable as a bedspread, decorative end-of-bed throw, lounge chair blanket or exotic picnic rug. 

Keep in Mind....

These Kantha Quilts are handmade by local artisans in the outer regions of Jaipur, India and may have some uneven or loose stitching; we believe this is part of their boho-chic appeal
